txt.en: Defeated Ruthless Dead spy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A Case of Fear
Speak with Jajax
'The man I saw and the man you found may be the same. I urge you to take a closer look at the body but don't get me more involved than I already am for I am not yet ready to travel further east.'
The body was placed here so that the dead could spy on the town!
Reexamine the body
You have cleared Jajax's name
The body is located on the bank of the river Ringló, in the town of Ethring.\n\nReturn to the body.
Ethring tavern is located in Ringló Vale.\n\nHave a drink with Jajax.
Jajax confirms where and when the death took place but leaves you to discover how it happened.

'The Dead were spying from the body of that poor Gondorian? And to think he died of fright.\n\n'Even in death what possess some to do what they do? I have no pity for these spirits and shall do what I can to vanquish them from my Vale.'
Laerind is located in Ethring village.\n\nYou should speak with Laerind.
The body is located on the bank of the river Ringló, in the town of Ethring.\n\nYou should examine the body again.
Have a drink with Jajax
Ethring tavern is located in Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should speak with Jajax.
Speak with Laerind
Ethring tavern is located in Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should speak with Jajax.
Speak with Jajax
Return to the body
Reexamine the body
The ale is quite good!

'Ah yes, I did know about those ghostly men. Not much bothers Jajax but the Dead I find disturbing. That is why I did not want to get involved. I am glad you sent them away. Now I can stay here longer and have some more of this fine Ethring ale!'\n\n'Have another drink with me, my friend!'
The body was placed here so that the Dead could spy on the town!
Perhaps a closer examination is in order as this body does look quite pale
'I hope that we cross paths again soon. You are going east as well?\n\n'Until next time, [placeholder]. May your adventures be profitable my friend!'
